channel.title: Blog on Frederico Gago – Tech Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Frederico Gago – Tech Blog

item.title: Reconciliação Automática de Contribuições (ERP ↔ Portal) com Python
item.description: Padrões práticos para alinhar duas fontes de dados mensais — com tolerância monetária, concorrência limitada, retries com backoff e upsert idempotente.

item.title: Longest Common Prefix: Five Algorithms Compared
item.description: Explore five different strategies to solve LeetCode 14 - Longest Common Prefix, complete with benchmarks, complexity analysis, and guidance on choosing the optimal approach.

item.title: From Spreadsheets to Scripts: My Journey Automating Accounting with Python
item.description: Discover how the Python language can transform repetitive accounting processes into efficient, automated, and error-free workflows.

item.title: Roman to Integer — Clean, Fast, and Functional Approaches Compared
item.description: LeetCode 13 — Parsing Roman numerals in Python using a clean single-pass solution and a functional overengineered version. Benchmarks and complexity included.

item.title: Is It a Palindrome Number? Three Ways to Solve It Without Converting to String
item.description: I explore three different approaches to check if an integer is a palindrome — from the most direct solution to a mathematical reversal without string conversion.
